sentence.Network_en: We drove east to Rostock, where my map led me astray.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们驱车向东去罗斯托克，但地图却给我指错了方向。

sentence.Network_en: After the row in a pub he drove off in a huff.
sentence.Network_cn: 在酒吧里吵了一架后，他气鼓鼓地开车走了。

sentence.Network_en: He drove his car through the gates at full pelt.

Sentence.sentence: It was late and he was very tired when he drove home.
He drove back out onto the street, looking for a parking space
He drove in, parked and hurried home to go to bed.
Short-term oil shortage drove American consumers to wait in long lines at gas pumps.
I went there last Saturday for their grand opening sale, but I drove around the parking lot for nearly an hour, looking for a space before I finally gave up and came home
She drove a full hour before finding a parking space

sentences.en: They come in droves to see the natural wonder.
sentences.cn: 他们一群群地来参观这一天然奇迹。
